entities.name: dumbledore's army
entities.description: Dumbledore's Army is a group of students who are fighting against Voldemort. It is mentioned that they sent messages to the rest of the group.

entities.name: the order of the phoenix
entities.description: The Order of the Phoenix is an organization that is working with Dumbledore's Army. They were informed by the D.A. about the evacuation and meeting in the Great Hall.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who is being fought against by Dumbledore's Army. He is not physically present but his presence is felt through the actions of the D.A.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a member of Dumbledore's Army and is involved in the evacuation and meeting in the Great Hall.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a member of Dumbledore's Army and is explaining to Harry what is happening.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is a member of Dumbledore's Army and is asking Harry what is going on.

entities.name: the great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is where everyone is meeting to get organized. It is mentioned that the younger kids are being evacuated there.

relationships.description: Dumbledore's Army informed The Order of the Phoenix about the evacuation and meeting in the Great Hall.
Harry is a member of Dumbledore's Army.
